<script lang="ts">
import { first } from "svelte-legos";
import { writable } from "svelte/store";

const data = writable([
	{
		name: "Svelte",
		author: "Rich",
		createdAt: Date.now(),
	},
	{
		name: "Vue",
		author: "Evan",
		createdAt: Date.now(),
	},
]);

const firstElement = first(data);

// $firstElement => { name: "Svelte", author: "Rich", createdAt: number }
</script>
